definition: to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist

sentences.english: These provide a foundation for the control of grinding quality of spiral bevel gear.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果爲螺旋錐齒輪磨齒質量的控制提供了依據。

sentences.english: Finally, the author studies the grinding gear setting and designs the drive system of machine tool.
sentences.chinese: 最後研究了磨齒裝置，設計了磨齒機的傳動系統。
